About

Will here! I’m a student/programmer/graphic designer/cyclist. I’m about to complete my Masters of Software Engineering at the University of Western Australia. I’m looking to fulfil the course’s practicum component by interning for an organisation with a software focus. I hope to infiltrate such as organisation and make myself indispensable, learning all of their secrets so that once I am a qualified engineer they will have no choice but to keep me around. If you are part of such an organisation, either in Perth or abroad, please ignore the preceding line and email me!
